channel.title: Time to rent a server? And How?
channel.description:
I've had the feeling that I need to move my server over to another host. At around [b]15-18 people lag[/b] starts to hit everyone. I was wondering wether or not I should search server hosting websites in order to fufill the player needs. There's a few problems though, I don't really know what I'm searching for. I'm not sure how I would set something like this up. I've never boughten server hosting from a site. I'm hoping someone here has done this before and could help me find a server hosting company that would hold an rs server. I don't want a private host either. I want a host from a server company.
The reason I want to do this is that my internet connection is [b]256k[/b] cable. That's [b]256k upstream[/b] and [b]256k downstream.[/b] [b]*please note the values are in k and not K*[/b] If anyone know how to host a server on a hosting company please tell me. I also [b]can't upgrade my current internet.[/b] Please help. :(
Thanks, Smitdog

item.title: Time to rent a server? And How?
item.dc:creator: @smitdog smitdog
item.description:
@smitdog wrote:

Nobody has really answered my question yet. How would I host my server on a server hosting company’s servers. In other words, if I pay for hosting, how would I set it up?

Read full topic
item.source: Time to rent a server? And How?

item.title: Time to rent a server? And How?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

kingdude(kingstun):

use a a sql server so it will be easier

Most sql servers are slower as is has to process the query to load the characters, stick to txt

Read full topic

item.title: Time to rent a server? And How?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

runescapekid:

try using hamachi to make it reduce lagg

Not nessecarily true… Look for tutorials on how to make your server hold more people without lagging.

I’ve had the feeling that I need to move my server over to another host. At around 15-18 people lag starts to hit everyone. I was wondering wether or not I should search server hosting websites in order to fufill the player needs. There’s a few problems though, I don’t really know what I’m searching for.
